body.raw:
In this guide, you will learn the tooling used in [Lobechat](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat).

# What's tooling?
You might be wondering what tooling means. If you check out [Bulletproof React's Project Standards](https://github.com/alan2207/bulletproof-react/blob/master/docs/project-standards.md),
it describes tools such as ESLint, Prettier, Husky etc.,

Similarly, in this guide, we provide an in-depth Lobechat tooling analysis.

# Lobechat tooling:

Lobechat is not a monorepo, you will find more information about Lobechat's project structure in project 
structure guide. We provide analysis of the tooling used:
1. [At root level](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat) as there is only one Next.js project in Lobechat's repository,
you do not find  any additional workspaces or packages like in a monorepo. 

Tooling might vary based on an app/workspace or packages or a single Next.js project.

## Tooling used:
- [.github](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/tree/main/.github)
- [.husky](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/tree/main/.husky)
- [.bunfig.toml](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.bunfig.toml)
- [.changelogrc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.changelogrc.js)
- [.commitlintrc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.commitlintrc.js)
- [.dockerignore](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.dockerignore)
- [.editorconfig](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.editorconfig)
- [.eslintignore](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.eslintignore)
- [.eslintrc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.eslintrc.js)
- [.i18nrc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.i18nrc.js)
- [.npmrc](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.npmrc)
- [.nvmrc](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.nvmrc)
- [.prettierignore](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.prettierignore)
- [.prettierrc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.prettierrc.js)
- [.releaserc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.releaserc.js)
- [.remarkrc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.remarkrc.js)
- [.seorc.cjs](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.seorc.cjs)
- [.stylelintrc.js](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/.stylelintrc.js)
- [Dockerfile](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/Dockerfile)
- [Dockerfile.database](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/Dockerfile.database)
- [codecov.yml](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/codecov.yml)
- [drizzle.config.ts](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/drizzle.config.ts)
- [netlify.toml](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/netlify.toml)
- [next.config.mjs](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/next.config.mjs)
- [renovate.json](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/renovate.json)
- [sentry.client.config.ts](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/sentry.client.config.ts)
- [sentry.edge.config.ts](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/sentry.edge.config.ts)
- [sentry.server.config.ts](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/sentry.server.config.ts)
- [tsconfig.json](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/tsconfig.json)
- [vercel.json](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/vercel.json)
- [vitest.config.ts](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/vitest.config.ts)
- [vitest.server.config.ts](https://github.com/lobehub/lobe-chat/blob/main/vitest.server.config.ts)
